field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable this zone.

field.label: Zone Name
field.help: Set the name for this zone. Both forward and reverse zones may be specified, i.e. example.com or 0.168.192.in-addr.arpa.

field.label: Allow Transfer
field.help: Define an ACL where you allow which server can retrieve this zone.

field.label: Allow Query
field.help: Define an ACL where you allow which client are allowed to query this zone.

field.label: Master IP
field.help: Set the IP address of master server when using slave mode.

field.label: Transfer Key Algorithm
field.help: Set the authentication algorithm for the TSIG key.

field.label: Transfer Key
field.help: The TSIG key used to transfer domain data from the master server.

field.label: Allow Notfiy
field.help: A list of allowed IP addresses to receive notifies from.
